info.name: Tourism Server API - Complete (160+ Endpoints)
info.description:
Complete API collection for Tourism Server - Production-ready Georgian tourism platform with multi-role authentication, real-time chat, notifications, inquiries, search/aggregator, reviews/ratings, media management, favorites, bookings, blog, AI content generation, credits, analytics, contact form, and comprehensive health monitoring.

Updated: 2026-02-16

## Authentication
- Bearer token authentication via `Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}`
- Tokens auto-captured from login/register responses
- Use `noauth` endpoints for public access
- CSRF protection: Include X-CSRF-Token header for state-changing requests

## User Roles
- USER: Regular travelers
- COMPANY: Tour operators
- GUIDE: Tour guides
- DRIVER: Drivers
- ADMIN: Administrators
- TOUR_AGENT: Company sub-accounts

## WebSocket
- Connect: `ws://localhost:8000/ws?token={{accessToken}}`
- Events: connected, heartbeat, user:online, user:offline, chat:message, notification:new
